"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a300c063687267ba000146#post_55a300c063687267ba000146
Neither do I

It's just so sudden, and I was just in a good mood too

Now it's completely shattered, and what sucks even more is that we're currently in a time where there's still a bit of disdain for Nintendo after E3, so not exactly the best time to leave his company while it's being viewed in a less than stellar light

Godspeed Iwata
